Entrenched Times.descriptions: Your must go to Entrenched News Server hub that focused in update leaks, leaderboard, comics and other stuff as there are still some plans in developing and expanding the server.
Entrenched Times.tier_rating: The one who manages the tier rating

Eagles of Illyria.descriptions:
``` '' Lavdi E Illirise '' - Illyrian Motto```
A faction largely dominated by sweats, no lifers and apparently has total idolisations of Albania, going as far even reclaiming the identity of ancestors of Albania, Illyria.

83rd Deathkorps of Krieg.descriptions:
``` '' DK '' x3 - DK Chant```
An extraterrestrial space invaders who have decided to claim their place in a barren wasteland of WW1, similarly to original homeworld (coincidence?). A sleeping giant just waiting to be poked at.

41st Strosstruppen Brigade.descriptions:
``` ''RUHM FUR DIE TOTEN!'' - 41st Chant``` 
Heavily militarised factions with the over the top of German Culture visibly being practised daily and thus encapsulating their positions as a true German faction despite not being a German themselves.

The White Legion.descriptions:
``` '' White Legion held the line! '' - TWL Chant``` 
The organisations that goes over a bit with the individuality of going beyond of societal bounds but yet managed to maintain to be the growing power in the community.

Confederacion Iberio-Americana.descriptions:
``` '' POR LA CIA!! '' - CIA Chant ```
A huge bloc of Hispanic community that entails over majority of the Hispanic community playerbase, bringing down the veil of justice against other factions with solidifying the Hispanic community playerbase in the faction scene.

Imperial Federation of R.descriptions:
``` '' RULE R! '' - IFR Chant ```
The community that stands alone in the face of toxicity now find itself in rubbles as the community are against them. The spirit of the R within them is still alight despite mockery and misery of the state they are currently at.

Valiant Timekeeper.descriptions:
``` '' REALITY IS A ILLUSION '' - Valiant Motto ```
An organisations that revolves around in maintaining order and keeping the timeline safe from anomalies now finds itself facing weird dimensional factions in Entrenched Community.

Imperio Aleman.descriptions:
``` '' Respeto, Disciplina y Diversion '' - IA Motto ```
Medium sized Hispanic factions that focused more in unity and friendship whilst also maintaining a cordial relations with other factons. Idea and culture revolves in the Imperial Germany.

Republika Kozak.descriptions:
``` '' Povstanya Sokoliv! '' - Kozak Chant ```
The most resilient and masochist faction as they seemed to be even more enthusiatic getting it the longer it goes on. It is imperative to act in caution as this faction has a long history of Kozak Curse.

Partisan Liberation Front.descriptions:
``` '' Slava PLF! '' - PLF Chant ```
Partisan decorated Yugoslavian faction with the factions fell under scrutiny from various factions during its debut before falling back on isolationism and maintain passive interactions with the Community ever since.

Great Toya.descriptions:
``` '' FOR TOYA '' - Toyan Chant ```
One of a rare few factions migrated from Trenches Beta, made a few successful debut before the falling out of Trenches Factions being not able to keep up with the Entrenched Geopoltics resulting their withdrawal.

Rusikiya Emperiya.descriptions:
``` '' God Save The Tsar! '' - RIA Chant ```
A community with a strong desire to follow the suit the Russian Empire actions that saw various falls, merge and lastly, before tuning into isolated faction and slowly being forgotten in the test of time.

Austria-Hungary.descriptions:
``` '' Glory to Austria-Hungary! '' - AH Chant ```
One of the community that often find troubles than it shouldn't have and has yet to received a proper educations from the community given how laxxed they are, sometimes.
